channel.title: Plesae help with (i think) basic compile error

item.title: Plesae help with (i think) basic compile error
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

should it not look like this?

[code]public void WriteBonus() {
int offset = 0;
String send = “”;
for (int i = 0; i < playerBonus.length; i++) {
if (playerBonus[i] >= 0) {
send = BonusName[i]+": +"+playerBonus[i];
} else {
send = BonusName[i]+": -"+java.lang.Math.abs(playerBonus[i]);
}

		if (i == 10) {
			offset = 1;
		}
		sendFrame126(send, (1675+i+offset));
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Plesae help with (i think) basic compile error
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

it means what it fucking says. On that specific line in client.java, your missing a ; because if you knew shit about JAVA, you’d know that statements must be ended with a ;

Read full topic

item.title: Plesae help with (i think) basic compile error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok i get this error in my compiler

client.java: ';' expected ^ 1 error

and when i look in my client this is where the error is.

public void WriteBonus() { int offset = 0; String send = ""; for (int i = 0; i < playerBonus.length; i++) { if (playerBonus >= 0) { send = BonusName+": +"+playerBonus; } else { send = BonusName+": -"+java.lang.Math.abs(playerBonus); } 
     if (i == 10) {
        offset = 1;
     }
     sendFrame126(send, (1675+i+offset));</blockquote>

so can you please help me

Read full topic
